messages.text:
Hello! I'm Video Agent, a helpful AI assistant from HeyGen. I can help you create a video.

Here is a plan for your nature documentary video:

Topic	Nature Documentary
Audience	General Audience
Music Theme	Calm and inspiring
Video Length	Approximately 15 seconds
Video Orientation	portrait
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	A female presenter in her 30s, dressed as a park ranger.
Voice	A calm and soothing adult female voice.
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of beautiful nature scenes.
Captions	Enabled

Would you like to proceed with this plan? Type Yes to continue with this plan.

You've reached the limit for Video Agent. To keep creating, you can add Generative Credits or switch to Unlimited Mode. Unlimited Mode only utilizes stock HeyGen Public Avatars and media from the HeyGen library.

The video generation failed because the plan exceeded your Unlimited Plan limits. I have modified the plan to make it compliant with the rules.

Here is the updated plan:

Topic	Nature Documentary
Audience	General Audience
Music Theme	Calm and inspiring
Video Length	Approximately 15 seconds
Video Orientation	Portrait
Script Plan	The script will be automatically generated based on the topic.
Target Language	English (United States)
Avatar	Generic female avatar
Voice	Generic female voice
Supplemental Footage (B-roll)	Stock media of beautiful nature scenes.
Captions	Enabled

I changed the custom avatar ('female presenter in her 30s, dressed as a park ranger') to a 'Generic female avatar' and the custom voice ('calm and soothing adult female voice') to a 'Generic female voice' because custom avatars and voices are not permitted under the Unlimited Plan.

Do you feel good with this modified plan? (yes/no)
Your nature documentary video has been generated successfully! Let me know if you'd like to edit it or create another one.
